title: The Middle Road
description: Sometimes it takes dying to remember to live. CarterI’m a dead man walking. I’ve always had it all—notoriety, fortune, any woman I want. Yet I’ve never lived. Armed with a desire to make my last days count, I set out on a cross-country trip. The last thing I expect to find is the woman of my dreams.I’ve always been the love ‘em and leave ‘em type. This time, I don’t want to leave. How do I tell the woman I love that our future isn’t a guarantee without ruining what’s left of our final days?TeddyI’m going nowhere fast.Music is my life. Holed up in some small apartment in Nashville with a man who keeps playing me like a guitar isn’t how my life is supposed to be.In my darkest hour, an angel arrives to save me. Well, maybe not an angel, but a hunk in an RV and a promise to take me anywhere I want to go. I never expected love to be a stop on the map. I’m falling for him. Hard. But something isn’t right. He’s holding back. Keeping secrets. Will those secrets mean the end of the road for us?The Middle Road is a full-length novel that will take ahold of your heartstrings and not let go. One-click this romantic adventure today!
author: K.G. Reuss
